page1.title: About Me
page1.content: The Internet has been a part my life since its early days. Since then I have decades of hands-on experience with some of the ever changing Internet technologies, and a passion pursuing what’s new and improved within the computer and electronic industries. . I am an Electronics Engineer specializing in web architecture, development, deployment, maintenancess .
